alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 3:21PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Natrona County through 345 PM MDT... At 321 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles east of Antelope Hills, or 17 miles northeast of Casper, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Natrona County. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 176 and 177, and between mile markers 203 and 204. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
